display_long_description:
Ludus Mentis - Challenge Your Mind is an exciting, brain-bending trivia game designed for VR! Test your knowledge across a wide range of topics, from history and science to pop culture and gaming. Built for players who love to learn, compete, and push their minds to the limit, Ludus Mentis offers a thrilling "Who Wants to Be a Millionaire"-style experience reimagined for virtual reality.

Choose your answers wisely as you progress through increasingly challenging questions. Use strategic lifelines when you're stuck, and feel the tension build with every level you climb! Whether you’re playing casually to sharpen your mind or aiming for the top prize, Ludus Mentis will keep you engaged, entertained, and constantly thinking.

With intuitive VR controls, stylish environments, and a dynamic atmosphere that adapts to your performance, Ludus Mentis brings the classic quiz show experience to life like never before. Are you ready to challenge yourself and claim your spot among the trivia elite?

Key Features:

    Hundreds of questions across multiple categories

    Strategic lifelines to help you when you're in doubt

    Immersive, stylish VR environments

    Dynamic difficulty to keep you on your toes

    Perfect for players of all skill levels

    Designed for Meta Quest and optimized for comfortable play

Sharpen your mind, embrace the challenge, and step into the ultimate VR trivia experience with Ludus Mentis - Challenge Your Mind!
